comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: A special request. This is the full map including index. Previously we loaded only part of the map showing the Razor Gang areas here: Be warned; it's a large file size. Enjoy! AB

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Instant Favourite!  Thank you  thank you thank you thank you thank you thank you thank you!

The detail, especially of the tram line routes, is astounding.

comment.author: 41732810@N00
comment._content: Very interesting! Would be grateful for an even higher resolution version though, as some of the smaller text is still difficult to read.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/71957223@N07] and anyone else interested in Sydney Maps - the National Library of Australia have an excellent and improving series of online interactive, zoomable, and linkable maps. Some of my bookmarked favourites (of various quality and scale) - 1802 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm1274-sd&width... 1836 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-t1551-sd&width=... 1858 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm1272-sd&rgn=&... 1880 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm3424-sd&rgn=&... 1890 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm1280-s1-sd&wi... 1892 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm1281-sd&rgn=&... 1895 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm3443-sd&rgn=&... 1903 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-rm1635-sd&rgn=&... 1905 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-f115-sd&width=1200 1907 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-db66-sd&rgn=&am... 1926 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-nic3-sd&width=1200 As I said above this map is outstanding for its excellent detail. It would be even better (!) if it were zoomable, like the NLA ones.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: And another - a wonderful 1822 map of Sydney with references to important buildings - 1822 - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview?pi=nla.map-f107-sd&rgn=&am...
